frontmatter.title: Choose your variable names carefully
frontmatter.summary: You have no idea how an innocuous variable name will begin to grate on your when you have to read it in 100+ emails and over 20 phone calls and meetings.  People will make up their own slang for a term, and soon it becomes nail on a chalkboard.

node.excerpt: I created a variable called the ccId for one of the primary objects in our database and applications.  It was shorthand for…

frontmatter.title: Rethinking this website
frontmatter.summary: I was trying to make this site too much like a real publication and not enough for what it is: a public sandbox for my ideas.  So I'm stripping it down and making it sloppier.

node.excerpt: I really hate the hassle of uploading images for these blurbs.  So I'm cutting most of them.  It's a waste anyway.  I'm not really…

frontmatter.title: I upgraded to Gatsby 3.0 and broke all the site images
frontmatter.summary: Read instructions before you npm.  I never cared for how Gatsby does images anyway.  If the site looks broken it's because it is.

node.excerpt: 04-14-2021: It's mostly working again, and I yanked a bunch of images from places I really didn't feel like fixing them.
